name: Steel Eggroll 2
description:
Summary:

Small platformer exploring a dark environment with a small light, it can take 3 to ??? minutes to finish depending on how much you suck at platformers.

The game is currently in Alpha stage and this is the first public test build.

Game mechanics:

You control Nimu, she can shoot, jump, double jump, grab platform ledges, block enemy projectiles and bounce off enemy heads and projectiles.

You need to rescue the crabs, unlock a door, climb some moving platforms and find the exit.

Future plans:
  • New powers/weapons
  • Inventory/consumables
  • Outfits and treasures in secret rooms
  • More stages
  • Whatever you suggest, maybe
Known bugs:
  • Scarab
  • Stag beetle
  • Ladybug
  • Fly
  • The game may not display lights properly on android depending on your phone

NIMU BERRY'S CHANNEL:

Nimu Berry - YouTube

Minimum reqs.

WindowsAndroidLinuxA potatoOS Android 9
RAM 2GB 
CPU 1,3 GHzWhy are you here?
